text: AITA for telling my MIL she cant wear white to my wedding??? She literally said she's wearing it "to honor my late mother" which is BS she just wants to steal my thunder.

AITA for uninviting my cousin last minute? He sent me like the rudest RSVP ever, saying "fine, i'll come but dont expect me to be happy about it" and honestly, who talks to the bride like that??? So i told him dont bother showing up.

AITA for making my fiancé's brother wear a suit? He wanted to wear jeans and a t-shirt and like, its a formal wedding, okay??? He's the Best Man, he needs to look the part, and he's acting like Im being unreasonable.

AITA for refusing to pay for my sister's bachelorette party? I'm the bride, i shouldnt have to pay for that, and she keeps saying its "tradition" that the bride pays. Honestly, shes being so cheap about it.

AITA for telling my dad he cant bring his new girlfriend to my wedding? She's like, 20 years younger than him and basically hit on my DH before we were even engaged... no way is she getting an invite.
AITA for telling my bridesmaids they have to pay for their own dresses? I found the perfect ones but like, theyre kinda expensive and they're all making a fuss. Its their job to support me, right??
AITA for disinviting my aunt because she threatened to bring her emotional support peacock?? i swear im not making this up. like, a peacock?? to a wedding?? no.

AITA for banning phones at my wedding? My mom keeps saying "what if something happens and we need to call someone???" like, honestly, use a landline if its that important??? i want people to be present.
AITA for telling my fiancé's dad he cant get drunk and give a speech? He literally told me he has a whole roast planned for us. No. Just no.
AITA for telling my friend she cant bring her new boyfriend to my wedding? Theyve only been dating for like, 3 weeks, and honestly, he looks like a total creep. i dont want that energy at my wedding.

aita for telling my aunt she cant have my late grandma's jewelry?? she basically said she deserves it because she was grandma's favorite lol. like what?? grandma told ME i could have it in her will which my aunt is now trying to contest?? im literally fuming right now.

WIBTA if i dont give my brother any of the money from our parents' estate?? he blew through his own inheritance and now expects me to bail him out after he literally tried to steal from our parents while they were still alive. he's been sober for like, a week and thinks that means he's entitled to a handout, honestly its ridiculous.

aita for refusing to pay for my sister's funeral?? my dad just passed and my sister, who literally never contacted him for the last five years, suddenly wants to have this big fancy send-off and expects me to foot the bill. she's always been the spoiled one, and im not falling for this guilt trip again.

AITA for keeping a secret painting our dad made from my siblings?? it's literally the only thing of his i really love, and they'd probably just sell it for drugs or something. i know its shady but my dad told me to keep it safe and honestly, i think that means from them lol.

WIBTA if i kicked my BIL out of my house after he spent his inheritance already?? he's been staying with us for six months and keeps asking for money, saying he's "between investments" lol. my wife is too soft to say no, so its up to me to actually be the bad guy here.

aita for telling my mom she cant sell our childhood home?? its literally all i have left of my dad after he died and she wants to sell it to fund her "world tour" like wtf. she has other assets, she just wants to be irresponsible with this one. its not fair.

AITA for not letting my mom and sister have any of my inheritance?? my parents died in a horrible accident and they've been nothing but awful to me my whole life, constantly putting me down and making me feel like crap. now they think they deserve my inheritance? no thank you. they can deal with their own problems.

WIBTA if i didn't tell my brother about the secret bank account our dad left me?? dad trusted me with it and said it was for emergencies but my brother is literally drowning in debt from gambling. if i tell him, he'll blow through it in a week and then come crying to me again. its just gonna enable him.

aita for refusing to loan my brother money for his "startup"?? its his fifth "startup" this year and they all fail spectacularly. he keeps asking me for loans and i'm sick of it. i've told him no, and now he's acting like i'm the bad guy for not supporting his dreams lol. they're not dreams if they never come true dude.

AITA for demanding my sister pay back the money she "borrowed" from our dad's estate without asking?? she took a significant chunk out before it was even finalized, claiming it was for "living expenses". she literally just bought a new designer handbag and went on vacation. its not fair and im tired of her taking advantage of everyone.

AITA for yelling at my neighbor because their cat keeps digging up my prize-winning petunias???  I've tried talking to them nicely like, SO many times, and they just laugh it off saying "oh Fluffy loves to dig!"  like that's an excuse for ruining my garden that I've spent HOURS on.  Literally hours.  So last night, I saw the little monster AGAIN, and I just lost it and screamed at them through the fence that if they dont keep their damn cat inside, I'm gonna start calling animal control EVERY DAY.  Now they're acting like I'm the crazy one??

AITA for rehoming my husband's dog without telling him??? Okay so, my husband got this dog before we were married, and it was fine at first, but lately it's just been a NIGHTMARE. It sheds like crazy, it chewed up my favorite shoes, and honestly it smells SO bad even after a bath. I finally got fed up and found a nice family that really wanted a dog, so I just dropped it off and figured he'd get over it. Now he's acting like I committed some major crime??

AITA for refusing to take my MIL's ridiculously pampered chihuahua to the vet??? She literally dresses it in little sweaters and makes it organic food. The thing bit me HARD last week when I tried to pet it, and now it has a cough, and she expects ME to take it because she "has a spa appointment". I told her absolutely not, that's YOUR dog and YOUR responsibility. She's now telling my husband I'm being cruel.

AITA for letting my cat "accidentally" fall out of my arms onto my ex's new girlfriend??? So my ex and I broke up amicably, or so I thought. Then he shows up with this new woman who's like, SUPER fake and kept bragging about how much better she is than me. We were at a mutual friend's barbecue, and my cat, who is usually super chill, just wigged out and I "dropped" her right on the new girl's lap. She screamed and the cat ran off. My ex is furious, but honestly, it felt kinda deserved.

AITA for telling my dad his prize-winning parrot is obnoxious??? My dad is OBSESSED with this bird, Captain Squawk, and it literally never shuts up. It screams at all hours of the day and night, mimics the phone ringing constantly, and just generally drives everyone insane. My dad thinks it's "talented". So last night, after being woken up for the fifth time by this feathered menace, I finally told him that the bird is a menace and he needs to train it or get rid of it. He's now not speaking to me.

AITA for ditching my friend's wedding to take my sick dog to the emergency vet??? My best friend was getting married yesterday and I was supposed to be a bridesmaid. But my dog, Buster, who's like my baby, started acting really weird and in a lot of pain. I tried to get him to go to the regular vet, but they were closed, so I had to take him to the emergency vet which is like an hour away. I texted my friend from the vet's office, and she basically exploded on me saying I ruined her wedding.

AITA for refusing to let my sister's obnoxious parrot stay in my house??? My sister is going on vacation for two weeks and asked if her parrot, Polly, could stay with me. I said absolutely not. Polly is loud, messy, and frankly, kind of aggressive. My sister acts like I'm abandoning her and the bird and is guilt-tripping me, saying "what kind of sister/friend are you???". I just don't want that bird in my house for two weeks, is that so unreasonable???

AITA for telling my roommate their hamster is gross??? My roommate got a hamster a few months ago, and it's honestly disgusting. The cage is always filthy, it smells, and the little thing just runs on its wheel all night making noise. I finally told them that their pet is gross and they need to clean it better or get rid of it. Now they're giving me the silent treatment.

AITA for not wanting my dog to be in my wedding photos??? My fiancé loves his dog and wants it to be in ALL of our wedding photos. I don't really like dogs that much, and honestly, the dog is kind of a slobber machine. I told him that the dog can be in one or two photos, but not like, every single shot. He's now saying I don't love him and his dog.

AITA for letting my cat "accidentally" knock my boss's expensive vase off the shelf??? My boss was coming over for a casual dinner party, and his new girlfriend, who is SUPER judgy, was there too. My cat, Whiskers, usually HATES strangers, and this woman was acting all high and mighty, so Whiskers, bless her heart, decided to make an "accident" and push this really ugly, expensive vase right off the shelf. It shattered everywhere. My boss is PISSED, and his girlfriend is acting like I'm some kind of monster.

AITA for threatening to call the cops on my roommate cuz he stole my food AGAIN??? like seriously this is like the fifth time this month! i bought all this expensive cheese and wine for my birthday dinner and he just ate it all without asking. now hes acting like i'm overreacting??? its not like its his food its MY food!!!!

AITA for telling my roommate to stop using my shampoo??? she knows i have sensitive scalp and cant use cheap stuff but she just keeps using my expensive Moroccan oil shampoo like its free real estate lol. now my scalp is breaking out and shes like "oh sorry i didnt realize it was THAT expensive" yeah NO KID it is!!!! shes literally using it up so fast i cant keep buying it its insane.

AITA for telling my roommate to get a job??? like hes 28 and just sits around playing video games all day while i work my butt off paying ALL the bills. i literally told him "you need to contribute something" and he got all offended saying i was being judgmental. im sorry but someone needs to pay rent or we are getting evicted???

AITA for throwing out my roommates rotting food??? literally there was this container of something unidentifiable in the back of the fridge that had been there for LIKE THREE WEEKS. it smelled like death. i asked him to throw it out like a week ago and he never did. so i did it. now hes mad cuz it was "experimental fermented kimchi" or whatever. WHAT EVER.

AITA for banning my roommates boyfriend from the apartment??? her new boyfriend is so gross, like he leaves his dirty socks everywhere and never showers. plus hes super loud and plays awful music all night. i told her he wasn't welcome anymore and shes acting like im trying to control her life. well NO duh i dont want that pig living here rent free!

AITA for yelling at my roommate for using my towel??? i literally have a system. my towels are grey, his are blue. we agreed. yesterday i walk into the bathroom and guess whose gross body is drying themselves with MY GREY TOWEL. like it was already damp too. i lost it. now hes all quiet and sulking. good.

AITA for demanding my roommate pay for the damage he caused to the couch??? he had a party last weekend and some drunk idiot spilled red wine ALL OVER my BRAND NEW COUCH. he said he'd clean it but it stained. now hes saying its "just an accident" and i should let it go. NO IT IS NOT JUST AN ACCIDENT WHEN YOU INVITE PEOPLE WHO ARENT ALLOWED TO BE THERE.

AITA for telling my roommate to stop having sex so loud??? like its 2am and im trying to sleep but all i hear is banging and moaning from the room next door. it's like they dont even realize other people live here. i literally banged on the wall and yelled "can you keep it down???" and now they're acting like im the bad guy. seriously??

AITA for refusing to let my roommate use my car??? i just got my license renewed and my car's insurance paid up. he asked if he could borrow it to go to the store and i said no. he's never driven it before and frankly he's a terrible driver. he gets so angry when i say no but its MY CAR its not like its some shared taxi service.

AITA for freaking out about my roommate's pet spider??? she told me she had a "small pet" but then i found out it was a HUGE tarantula that she keeps in a tank in the living room. i am absolutely terrified of spiders and now i have to share a common space with it??? shes saying i should just get over it but its literally my worst nightmare.

AITA for refusing to make my MIL's weirdly specific gluten-free, dairy-free, nut-free, sugar-free, vegan, low-FODMAP turducken for Thanksgiving? She basically gave us a list of ingredients that don't exist and then complained the whole time about how "sad" her plate looked even though she swore it was "delicious" lol.

AITA for telling my brother his new wife's gravy tasted like despair and regret? We were at Thanksgiving dinner and it was literally the worst thing I've ever put in my mouth like it was so watery and bland and I just couldn't hold it in anymore he told me to be nice but honestly??

AITA for banning my dad from our house during Christmas dinner after he got drunk and started ranting about how my fiancé is "too progressive" for our family? He literally started yelling about socialism and gay marriage at the table, it was SO awkward and embarrassing, my SO was trying to be polite but like, my dad was out of control.

AITA for accidentally setting off the smoke alarm three times during Thanksgiving dinner and then crying when my aunt told me I was ruining the holiday? I swear I was just trying to help cook the sweet potatoes and the oven was REALLY hot, I didnt mean to make a mess.

AITA for insisting my sister's obnoxious boyfriend sit at the kids' table during Christmas dinner? He's 30, and he acts like a child, constantly interrupting and talking over everyone, so I figured it was the only way to have a peaceful meal for literally anyone else.

AITA for telling my cousin she looked like a "sad, deflated turkey" after she complained about her outfit for the third time on Thanksgiving? We were all dressed up and she was being SO dramatic about her dress not fitting right and honestly, she kinda did look like a sad, deflated turkey.

AITA for punching my BIL in the face at Christmas dinner after he made a joke about my career being a "failure"? He literally knows how hard I've worked and then he just drops that bomb when everyone's there? I totally lost it.

AITA for hiding my husband's 'special' Thanksgiving pie from his extremely critical mother? He baked it for himself and she always rips on him for it, saying it's "too sweet" or "too chocolatey" so I just... hid it in the back of the fridge so she wouldn't even see it and ruin his whole vibe.

AITA for throwing my MIL's experimental Jell-O salad out the window on Christmas Eve? It was this weird lime green concoction with olives and ham chunks and it smelled like regret. I just couldn't stand the thought of it touching my good silverware.

AITA for leaving Thanksgiving dinner early after my aunt told me I was "too thin" and needed to eat more? She said it loud enough for everyone to hear and kept shoving food on my plate, it was SO mortifying and uncomfortable, I just got up and left.
AITA for not letting my coworker use my "fancy" ergonomic keyboard when his broke????

so like, my job is basically a nightmare of cubicle hell, right? i finally got this AMAZING ergonomic keyboard that cost me like, an arm and a leg, because my wrists are literally always screaming at me. my coworker, dave, who is honestly the WORST, comes up to me yesterday, all dramatic, saying his keyboard *mysteriously* broke and can he just use mine for "like, a day." a DAY??? dave breaks stuff constantly and never replaces it. i told him no, sorry, but it's mine and i need it. he huffed and puffed and went to complain to our boss. now the boss is acting like i'm being difficult?? it's MY keyboard, and my wrists cant handle a regular one!!!
AITA for reporting my boss for "sexual harassment" when he just kept complimenting my outfit?????

okay so my boss is this older guy, like late 50s maybe. he's always been a bit… much. anyway, lately he's been going on and on about how "nice" my blouses are, or how "that color looks great on you." i'm like, okay?? thanks?? but then he started leaving little sticky notes on my monitor saying stuff like "you always brighten up my day." and one time he even asked if i was single???? i panicked and went to HR, and now there's an investigation. he's acting like i totally overreacted and he was just being nice. but it felt creepy!!!!! am i wrong???
AITA for telling everyone in the office that Brenda from accounting is a total liar about her "crucial" role in the company?????

Brenda from accounting basically does NOTHING important. she's always bragging about how she's the "glue that holds this place together" and how "without her, the whole system would collapse." meanwhile, she spends half her day on her phone and her actual work is always late and full of mistakes. so, during our team lunch yesterday, someone asked her about some obscure report and she went on this whole rant about how she saved us from a financial disaster. i just couldn't take it anymore and blurted out that she literally never does anything and everyone knows it. she burst into tears and now the whole office is in drama mode. i think i did everyone a favor tbh.
AITA for throwing out my coworker's "award-winning" artisanal coffee beans??????

so my coworker, MARK, is literally obsessed with his stupid fancy coffee beans. he brings them in every single day and makes this whole production of brewing it in the breakroom, taking up ALL the space and smelling up the place. it's disgusting. anyway, he went on vacation for two weeks, and i guess he forgot his precious beans on the counter. they've been sitting there, getting all stale and probably attracting bugs, for ages. i finally got fed up and tossed them. he came back today and is absolutely LOSING HIS MIND, yelling about how they were special and expensive. i told him they were expired garbage. am i the asshole here?????
AITA for demanding my coworker reimburse me for the expensive noise-canceling headphones i bought because of his constant humming?????

this guy in the cubicle next to me, GARY, HUMS. constantly. it's not even a tune, just this low, incessant drone that drives me absolutely INSANE. i've tried everything - earplugs, moving desks (which wasn't possible long-term), nothing worked. so i finally broke down and bought these ridiculously expensive noise-canceling headphones. they work, thank god, but now i'm thinking, why should I have to pay for this???? it's his fault i'm making this expense. so i told him he needs to pay me back for them. he's acting like i'm completely unhinged???
AITA for complaining about my boss's "motivational" signs that are literally just passive-aggressive insults??????

my boss thinks he's some kind of business guru. he's plastered these signs all over the office walls. things like "winners dont wait for opportunities, they create them" (implying im a loser???) or "if you're not sweating, you're not working hard enough" (implying im lazy????). i finally had enough and told him during a team meeting that these signs are incredibly demotivating and make everyone feel like crap. he just smiled and said "tough love is the best love." now everyone is looking at me like i'm the problem for complaining???
AITA for not sharing my lunch with my "hangry" coworker who always forgets his?????????

there's this guy, CHAD, who works in my department and literally forgets his lunch every single day. then around 11 am, he starts acting like he's going to pass out and asks everyone if they have anything to spare. today, he asked me, and i was literally in the middle of eating my sandwich, which was the only thing i packed for myself. i told him no, sorry, this is all i have. he got all pouty and went to find someone else. my other coworkers think i'm being stingy, but honestly, it's exhausting dealing with his forgetfulness every single day.
AITA for using my vacation days to attend a meme convention instead of helping my team with a "critical" project launch?????

so, we have this HUGE project launching next month, and everyone is supposed to be working overtime and canceling all their plans. i, however, had booked my vacation time months ago to attend "MemeCon" (it's a real thing, okay???) and i'm not canceling. my boss called me into his office and basically told me i'm being selfish and jeopardizing the entire launch. i told him that my mental health is important and i needed this break, and that i'd catch up on work when i got back. now he's threatening disciplinary action. is it really that big of a deal????
AITA for subtly sabotaging my coworker's presentation because he stole my idea and presented it as his own?????????

okay, so i had this brilliant idea for a new marketing campaign. i even drafted out the whole thing and told my coworker, STEVE, about it. he seemed super interested. then, at the big client meeting today, GUESS WHO presents MY campaign as HIS brilliant idea??? yeah, steve. i was so mad. so, when it was his turn to present, i "accidentally" unplugged his laptop from the projector for like, a solid minute. then i "accidentally" spilled a little water near his notes. he totally fumbled and the clients looked unimpressed. i feel a little bad, but mostly just smug. am i the asshole for that?????
AITA for refusing to participate in my company's "team-building" escape room that i know for a fact is rigged?????

my company loves doing these stupid team-building exercises. the latest one is an escape room, and i absolutely REFUSE to go. why, you ask? because i know the owner of this escape room place, and he told me they literally rig them to make the "winning team" (which is always the one the bosses pick) get out faster. it's all fake and a waste of time and money. i told my boss i had "personal reasons" for not attending, and he's acting like i'm not a team player. i'm not wasting my Saturday on a fake challenge!!!
AITA for refusing to go on a family vacation because my sister’s kids are too loud?
AITA for "ruining" my mom’s dream vacation by bringing up her controlling behavior???
AITA for ditching my family vacation early because my brother kept hitting on my SO??
AITA for not wanting to share my hotel room with my parents on vacation so they could save money?
AITA for telling my SIL she’s not allowed to bring her "emotional support peacock" on our family cruise?
AITA for demanding my family pay me back for the vacation I planned when they all complained the whole time???
AITA for refusing to take my brother's screaming toddlers to Disneyland with us on our "relaxing" family trip???
AITA for telling my dad he can't bring his new much younger girlfriend on our annual family beach house vacation??
AITA for not letting my sister pick the destination AGAIN for our family vacation and insisting on my choice for once???
AITA for telling my family that their constant "let's all go to Hawaii" talk is unrealistic and they need to stop living in a fantasy??

AITA for naming our son "Adolf" because my husband's grandpa was a HUGE WWII history buff and I thought it sounded distinguished?? Like, honestly, we just thought it was a cool, strong name and my DH swore his grandpa would have loved it, he was like, OBSESSED with the Third Reich. So yeah, now everyone is calling me a monster and saying I ruined my kid's life before he was even born, especially my MIL who literally screamed at me for like an hour straight, said I was trying to *piss them off* and she's going to disown our baby. Like, what the actual F?? It's just a name, people!!!

aita for naming my daughter "Chaos" because she was a colicky baby and basically lived up to the name?? My SO thinks it's too much and wants to change it to something "normal" but honestly, Chaos just *fits* her so perfectly, she's literally a walking tornado of tantrums and crying, its hilarious and totally her personality. My family thinks its cruel and that I'm setting her up for failure, my mom cried when I told her and said I shouldve picked something like "Serenity" to counteract the chaos lol as if that would actually work??? But seriously, its just a nickname that stuck, its not like I'm actually naming her Satan or something.

AITA for insisting on naming our baby "Lucifer" because my DH has a thing for fallen angels and I thought it was so edgy and unique??? Everyone in my family and his family is freaking out, calling me insane and saying I'm deliberately trying to sabotage our child's future social life. My own mother is threatening to not attend the baby shower if I dont change it, and my DHs mom keeps sending me articles about the negative connotations of the name and how its literally the devil's name. Honestly, I dont even care about the devil, I just thought it sounded powerful and cool, and its not like the baby is ACTUALLY going to be evil???

aita for naming my son "Genghis"??? My husband is Mongolian and his family loved it and said it was a strong name for a strong boy and honestly, I just went with it bc I was so tired and overwhelmed during the pregnancy and it sounded...different. Now my friends are telling me im basically naming him after a mass murderer and rapist and that hes going to get bullied relentlessly. One of my friends even said I should prepare to defend him from literal historical reenactors, which is just ridiculous. Like, okay, he was a bad guy, but its just a name, its not like the kid IS Genghis Khan, ya know???

AITA for wanting to name our daughter "Kool-Aid" because I'm obsessed with the 90s and it just screams nostalgia and fun??? My SO says it sounds like a cheap beverage and that our kid will be the laughingstock of her entire existence. My own mother literally choked on her tea when I told her, and my SIL said it was a "direct insult to the concept of personhood." Honestly, I just think its cute and memorable, like a little burst of color and flavor in the world. Its not like she'll be *forced* to drink it, obviously.

AITA for naming my son "McLovin"????? My husband thought it was HILARIOUS and a great inside joke from that movie and, like, yeah, it *is* funny, but I also just thought it sounded kind of cute in a weird way. Our parents are absolutely losing their minds, my dad is threatening to "write him out of the will" and my husband's mom is telling me I'm "destroying a human soul." But like... its just a funny name, and he'll have a last name too, it won't be *just* McLovin. Plus, it gives him something to talk about when he's older, right??

aita for naming my daughter "Victorious" because we literally had to fight so hard to have her?? She was a high-risk pregnancy, I almost died, my husband nearly lost his job dealing with the stress, it was just constant battle after battle. So when she finally arrived, safe and sound, "Victorious" just felt so fitting, you know? A celebration of overcoming. But now everyone is saying it's too pompous and that she'll be a spoiled brat with a superiority complex. My MIL even said it sounds like I'm *expecting* her to be a celebrity. Honestly, its just a reminder of what we went through and how amazing it is that she's here.

AITA for naming our son "Reaper" because my husband is a huge goth and also a paramedic, and he said it represented the cycle of life and death?? My family thinks its terrifying and that I'm basically inviting negativity into our home. My own mom called me and just sobbed, asking if I wanted our son to have a short, tragic life. And my DHs parents are saying it's "morbid and inappropriate" for a child. But like... it's supposed to be symbolic? And it sounds cool, admit it. Its not like we call him that *all* the time, mostly just when he's sleeping really deeply and looks like he's not breathing lol.

AITA for naming my daughter "Covid"???? Look, I know it sounds TERRIBLE, but hear me out. We were trying for SO long to get pregnant, and it took us ages and so much heartache, and then BAM, the pandemic hit and somehow, miraculously, I got pregnant. So, it's like, this name is a reminder of how much we wanted her and how much effort it took, and also that she was conceived during this crazy time in history. My husband is actually on board, but my entire family is telling me I'm insane and I'm going to make her life miserable, and my own sister said I should just adopt her out now. But its just a name, and its meaningful to *us*, that's all that matters right???

aita for insisting on naming our baby "Megatron"?? My husband is a HUGE transformers fan and he basically begged me, and honestly, I kinda liked the sound of it too. It sounds so powerful and strong, you know?? But my parents are literally disgusted, they said it sounds like a robot supervillain and that I'm setting our son up for a lifetime of being called "Decepticon" or something equally awful. My MIL is also threatening to not come to the hospital if I go through with it. But like, its not that serious?? He'll still have his dad's last name, it won't be *all* Megatron.

AITA for posting a pic of my brother's messy apartment without his permission??? he lives like a slob and i was literally dying of laughter, like, it was art... anyway, he freaked out and said i violated his privacy like im some kind of stalker but i just wanted to share the chaos lol

AITA for sharing screenshots of my ex's weird texts with my friends??? he was being so clingy and saying like, creepy stuff, and i just needed to vent and get some outside opinions on whether he was losing his mind or if i was?? now hes accusing me of harassment

AITA for commenting on my coworker's post about her vacation pics?? she looked kinda rough in one of them and i just thought maybe a filter woudl help or something, you know?? she took it so personally and said i was being judgmental and rude

AITA for liking my ex's new gf's posts??? my ex is my best friend's brother and she posted pics of them being all cute and i just hit like cuz i'm trying to be supportive?? but my friend is livid saying i'm betraying her and rubbing salt in her wound even tho they broke up ages ago

AITA for screenshotting my dad's political rants on facebook and sending them to my aunt?? my dad is super conservative and my aunt is super progressive and they always fight about politics and i thought maybe showing my aunt his craziest takes woudl help her understand why he's like that?? instead she's calling me a traitor

AITA for reading my niece's private messages on her phone?? she's like 12 and i was worried about her talking to strangers online, and i found some super sketchy stuff so i told her parents?? now she hates me and wont talk to me, so yeah am i the asshole???

AITA for posting a story about my MIL's engagement party?? it was like, super awkward cuz her new guy is way younger than her and looked like he was there for the money, and i just shared a funny little observation about it in my story with my close friends?? apparently my SIL saw it and now the whole family thinks im a terrible person

AITA for sharing my bf's embarrassing childhood photos?? he told me i could use them for a slideshow for his birthday but then i got drunk and posted like, five of them on my main feed with funny captions?? he said i was mortifying him and that i should have known better

AITA for posting about my roommate's terrible hygiene?? like, seriously its bad, she never showers and her room smells and i just made a anonymous post on our building's facebook group about it?? hoping someone woudl see it and tell her, but now everyone thinks its me and shes furious

AITA for posting a throwback pic of me and my ex?? we were just good friends and i was reminiscing about good times, and i tagged him cuz he was in the pic, and now my current GF is having a meltdown thinking im trying to get back with him?? i swear i'm not!!!

AITA for throwing my parents' flip phone away becuz they refuse to get a smartphone? they literally just use it to text and call me anyway and i cant stand waiting for them to type out long messages or dealing with their awful reception when they call, its honestly so annoying and they said they cant afford one so i said id get them a cheap android and surprise them and surprise! they werent home so i just chucked the old one. now theyre freaking out

AITA for deleting my grandma's Facebook because she kept posting conspiracy theories about 5G and vaccines? she's like 80 and i love her but she was getting SO out of hand with it and her posts were genuinely scary and i was worried about her, plus her friends were all commenting crazy stuff back and forth so i just logged into her account and deleted it all and then logged out. shes been crying and saying i stole her social life, but like it was for her own good????

AITA for refusing to help my dad set up his new smart TV? he got this fancy new tv with all the apps and stuff and he wants me to help him figure it out but im busy and he always complains about how much time "kids these days" spend on their phones so i told him he should figure it out himself or ask his friend who actually uses technology. now hes mad and saying im ungrateful and that i "owe him" becuz he bought me stuff when i was little?? like what does that even mean

AITA for printing out my dad's emails instead of forwarding them? he asked me to send him some important stuff he missed while he was on vacation and i just printed it all out, about 30 pages worth, and left it on his desk. he asked me why i didnt just forward them like a normal person and i said becuz im old fashioned and i like having paper copies? he got so mad and said it was a waste of paper and ink and that i was being difficult. he literally uses email for work, why cant he just deal with it like a grown up.

AITA for unplugging my grandpa's dial-up modem? he still has dial-up internet, yes dial-up, and it's been making this awful screeching noise for like a week straight. i finally snapped and unplugged it, like who even uses that anymore??? he's been yelling at me for days and saying its his only way to "stay connected" and that im ruining his life. but its LITERALLY making my ears bleed.

AITA for telling my mom she needs to learn how to use her phone camera properly? she always takes pictures of random stuff and blurry selfies and then sends them to me asking "what is this?" or "who is this?" and i get so annoyed. i tried showing her like five times how to focus and frame shots and she just wont learn. so i told her if she cant figure it out then maybe she should just stick to texting. now shes hurt and says im being mean, but im just tired of seeing her garbage photos.

AITA for banning my teenage nephew from using my smart speaker? he's like 14 and he keeps asking it to play annoying music or tell him jokes in the middle of the night when im trying to sleep. i got the thing so i could listen to podcasts, not so he could annoy me. i told him he could use it if he was quiet and polite but he just kept being loud so i just said he cant use it at all anymore. now his mom, my sister, is saying im being a spoilsport.

AITA for refusing to help my uncle set up his new VR headset? he got this fancy VR thing and wants me to help him set it up and teach him how to use it. hes like 60 and has never even used a computer properly, so i know it'll be a nightmare. i told him maybe he should just stick to reading books or something, becuz this tech stuff is probably too much for him. he got really offended and said i was being condescending.

AITA for accidentally deleting my grandma's digital photo album? she asked me to help her organize her photos on her tablet and i thought i was being helpful by "cleaning up" duplicates. turns out i deleted like 10 years worth of memories. she's devastated and crying and i feel awful but also like she should have backed them up better??? and not let a teenager touch her files in the first place.

AITA for telling my mom to just google it? she's constantly asking me "how do I do this?" about everything, like how to bake something or fix something around the house. i finally just told her to get a smartphone and google it herself becuz i dont have time to be her personal IT department for her entire life. she said i was being dismissive and that she doesnt have the patience for computers. i just think shes being lazy.
